member.summary: Provides unique device identifiers.

member.summary: Gets or sets the formatter to use.

member.name: M:Speedy.Application.DeviceId.AddComponent(System.String,Speedy.Application.IDeviceIdComponent)
member.summary: Adds a component to the device identifier. If a component with the specified name already exists, it will be replaced with this newly added component.

member.name: M:Speedy.Application.DeviceId.AddMacAddress(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds the MAC address to the device identifier, optionally excluding wireless adapters.
member.param: A value indicating whether wireless adapters should be excluded.

member.name: M:Speedy.Application.DeviceId.AddMachineName
member.summary: Adds the machine name to the device identifier.

member.summary: Adds the operating system version to the device identifier.

member.name: M:Speedy.Application.DeviceId.AddUserName
member.summary: Adds the current user name to the device identifier.

member.name: M:Speedy.Application.DeviceId.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the device identifier.
member.returns: A string representation of the device identifier.
